<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>GET</http_method><name>Fetch</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
var result = [];
// result.push({callerName:request.pathParams.callerID});
    // implement resource here
	var gr = new GlideRecord('incident');
	// gr.addQuery('number',request.pathParams.IncidentNumber);
	// gr.query();
	// if(gr.next())
	// {
	// 	result.push({sysId: gr.sys_id});
	// }else
	// {
	// 	result.push({Record: "not found"});
	// }
	gr.addQuery('caller_id.name',request.pathParams.callerID);
	gr.query();
	var count = 0
	
while(gr.next()){
	var num = gr.number;
	result.push({sr:count++,number:num,sysId:gr.sys_id});
}
response.setBody(result);
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_288685_my_new_ap/createincident/fetchdata/{callerID}</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/fetchdata/{callerID}</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-08-05 09:07:13</sys_created_on><sys_id>1c9a3ac28373021075f4b3a6feaad3a6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>16</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Fetch</sys_name><sys_package display_value="MY NEW Application" source="x_288685_my_new_ap">60fb1ea08343021075f4b3a6feaad31a</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="MY NEW Application">60fb1ea08343021075f4b3a6feaad31a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_1c9a3ac28373021075f4b3a6feaad3a6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-08-05 10:19:25</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="CreateIncident">4f423a0a8333021075f4b3a6feaad331</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>
